reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress beautiful in color, comfortable, and of good quality, with one noting it's perfect for Christmas. The material receives mixed feedback - while many find it soft, one customer mentions it feels cheap. Customers disagree on the fit, with some saying the size M fits just right while others find the top doesn't sit well. The dress's size and dressiness receive mixed reviews, with some finding it true to size while others say it's too big, and opinions vary on how versatile it is for different occasions. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gorgeous color
items.body: Absolutely gorgeous dress! I saw previous reviews complaining about the buttons and gaps. Apparently the company paid attention! This is sewn and very modest neckline, no gaping or cleavage show! Fabric is soft, comfortable, and flows! I only wish this dress had pockets! I'll be wearing this to Christmas dinner. For reference, I'm a sz 12 to 14. I ordered the XL, I think Lg would've worked, but I like a looser fit. I'm 5'1 so I may hem this as it comes to my ankles. Still happy with the style, fit, and color! Read more
items.author: Life full of lemons

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for Christmas
items.body: Really cute! Looks nice and true to size for me. I am a smaller bust, but still looks and fits fine. Material feels a little cheap. Read more
items.author: Michelle Weaver

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful dress!
items.body: Gorgeous and SO comfortable! I wore this for family photos and received so many compliments. It fits a little large everywhere except the bust and was not too terrible long on me even though I am just 5' 2". Read more
items.author: Niki Rose

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars The perfect evening and/or holiday dress
items.body: Absolutely beautiful dress. Fit perfectly (and I have curves). Very comfortable to wear! Read more
items.author: JHall

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not great for a busty person, beautiful fabric
items.body: The material is gorgeous and the color very pretty. I did not feel the bust was comfortable and feel I may be too busty for it. The amount of material on the bottom is flowy and full. I returned. I felt the bottom was too much for the top not fitting as well. For reference I am 5’5” and weigh 185 lbs. I normally wear a large but I couldn’t tell if it was too big or too small. Read more
items.author: Mary

items.title: 2.0 out of 5 stars Color is wrong
items.body: Not the same color!! Ordered Champagne and got brown.. This is not the same as pictured at all. Ordered to color coordinate a photo shoot and big fail on that end. Fit and comfort is fine for the price. Read more
items.author: Tara

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Color off.
items.body: Prrtty but color was quite different than pictured so I returned it. Read more
items.author: MJ

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Size up if you have a larger waist, true to size.
items.body: Love this dress, perfect fit but if you do not have a small waist you will need to size up. The quality of the material is a bit thicker so it is just right to wear on a cold weather day. This dress is very comfortable and can be dressy for any occasion. Read more
items.author: Elizabeth Calderon

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Cocktail Formal Long Sleeve V Neck is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Cocktail Formal Long Sleeve V Neck is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Red, Brown, Gold, Wine Red, Blue, Royal Blue, Black, Champagne, Green. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
